item.title: 竞争白热化，先锋计划再推出两只债券型 ETF
item.description: Vanguard Group Inc. 继去年将其面向州和地方政府债务投资者的产品阵容扩大两倍之后，又推出了两款新的市政债券交易所交易基金产品。【原文：Vanguard Group Inc. is launching two new municipal-bond exchange-traded fund offerings after tripling its lineup of products catering to state and local-government debt investors last year.】

item.title: 从美国到德国的融资大转移
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 欧洲发射阿丽亚娜 6 号火箭，国防领域加速发展
item.description: 欧洲阿丽亚娜6号火箭在数次推迟后于周四起飞执行首次商业任务，这有助于欧洲大陆减少对埃隆-马斯克的SpaceX公司的依赖。【原文：The European Ariane 6 rocket took off for its first commercial mission on Thursday after several delays, helping the continent’s efforts to reduce its reliance on Elon Musk’s SpaceX.】

item.title: 加拿大关注北极军事扩张以回应特朗普的要求
item.description: 加拿大正在扩大其在北极地区的军事存在，以满足特朗普政府关于增加国防开支的要求，并遏制中国和俄罗斯对这一偏远地区的影响。【原文：Canada is expanding its military presence in the Arctic region as it tries to appease the Trump administration’s calls for higher defense spending and deter Chinese and Russian influence in the remote region.】

item.title: 英国央行曼称利率渐进主义 "不再有效
item.description: 英格兰银行政策制定者凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）表示，渐进式的利率变动不再能向动荡的金融市场发出明确的信号，现在需要更大的变动来 "穿透 "噪音，以利于经济发展。【原文：Gradual interest-rate moves no longer send clear signals to volatile financial markets and larger shifts are now needed to “cut through” the noise for the good of the economy, Bank of England policymaker Catherine Mann said.】

item.title: 拜登时代 "雄心勃勃 "之后，美国证券交易委员会 Uyeda 预计规则制定工作将放缓
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会临时主席表示，在经过三年半 "过于雄心勃勃 "的市场改革之后，他预计华尔街监管机构的规则制定工作将放缓。【原文：The interim chief of the US Securities and Exchange Commission says he expects a slowdown in the Wall Street regulator’s rulemaking after three-and-half “overly ambitious” years of pursuing market reforms.】

item.title: 无人机防御初创公司 Shield AI 获得 53 亿美元估值
item.description:
该公司正在筹集 2.4 亿美元，并向软件领域进军。【原文：

The company is raising $240 million and pushing into software.

】

item.title: 约翰内斯堡被要求在二十国集团峰会前整理好内务
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）警告约翰内斯堡的官员，在 11 月 20 国集团领导人峰会召开之前，必须解决困扰该市的各种问题。【原文：South African President Cyril Ramaphosa warned officials in Johannesburg to resolve a myriad of problems dogging the city ahead of a summit of leaders from the Group of 20 nations in November.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔诺沃亚下令提前支付重大石油交易费用
item.description: 厄瓜多尔总统丹尼尔-诺沃亚（Daniel Noboa）已下令一个寻求接管该国最大石油资产的财团在3月11日前支付15亿美元的入股费，将最后期限提前了三个多星期。【原文：Ecuador’s President Daniel Noboa has ordered a consortium seeking to take over the nation’s top oil asset to pay an entry fee of $1.5 billion by March 11, moving up the deadline by more than three weeks.】

item.title: 银湖基金与对冲基金就竞购 WWE 所有者展开对峙
item.description: 银湖管理公司（Silver Lake Management）和以赛事为导向的对冲基金之间正在就私募股权公司竞购比佛利山庄艺人经纪公司 Endeavor Group Holdings Inc.【原文：A faceoff is unfolding between Silver Lake Management and event-driven hedge funds over the private equity firm’s bid for Endeavor Group Holdings Inc., the Beverly Hills talent agency backing the WWE and UFC — and the winner may be decided in court.】

item.title: 范围显示，德国债务可能在五年内膨胀 6,250 亿欧元
item.description: 根据 Scope Ratings 的数据，在未来五年内，德国的借贷可能会膨胀到占国内生产总值的 13%，以便为其计划中的国防和基础设施支出提供资金。【原文：Germany’s borrowings may balloon by as much as 13% of gross domestic product within the next half decade to fund its planned spending on defense and infrastructure, according to Scope Ratings.】

item.title: 福特汉姆大学获得 1 亿美元捐赠以扩展 STEM 项目
item.description: 福特汉姆大学（Fordham University）将获得 1 亿美元的捐赠，这是该校历史上最大的一笔捐赠，用于在布朗克斯（Bronx）校区建造一座新的科学大楼，并扩大 STEM 课程。【原文：Fordham University is getting a $100 million gift — the largest in the school’s history — to build a new science building on its Bronx campus and expand STEM offerings.】

item.title: 丹麦配合欧洲央行降息以维护货币联系汇率制
item.description: 丹麦中央银行将基准利率下调了四分之一个百分点，与欧洲同行保持一致，以维护克朗与欧元的挂钩。【原文：Denmark’s central bank cut its benchmark rate by a quarter point, aligning with its European counterpart to defend the krone’s peg to the euro.】

item.title: 加拿大、墨西哥货币因关税减免迹象而反弹
item.description: 在美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）发出唐纳德-特朗普总统可能会放弃某些关税计划的信号后，加元和墨西哥比索走强。【原文：The Canadian dollar and Mexican peso strengthened after US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick signaled President Donald Trump might walk back on some planned tariffs.】

item.title: 波音公司首席执行官称关税可能导致成本上升和供应中断
item.description: 波音公司（Boeing Co.波音公司首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）对员工说，唐纳德-特朗普总统征收的关税有可能导致成本上升，这凸显了精细调整的供应链网络现在面临中断的脆弱性。【原文：Boeing Co. Chief Executive Officer Kelly Ortberg told employees that tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump risk driving up costs, highlighting the fragility of a finely tuned supply-chain network that now faces disruption.】

item.title: 咨询公司 BRG 在为 LBO 出售债务时遭遇网络攻击
item.description: 据知情人士透露，伯克利研究集团上周遭受了一次网络攻击，而此时银行正在寻求完成债务出售，以便为塔布鲁克资本合伙公司（Towerbrook Capital Partners）收购这家咨询公司提供资金。【原文：Berkeley Research Group suffered a cyberattack last week, according to people with knowledge of the matter, just as banks have been looking to wrap up a debt sale that would finance the consulting firm’s buyout by Towerbrook Capital Partners.】

item.title: 短期国债收益率因就业岗位减少而继续下滑
item.description: 短期国债收益率下降，原因是在周五即将公布的 2 月份大数据之前，两个极少有影响力的经济数据凸显了美国劳动力市场的疲软。【原文：Short-term Treasury yields declined as two rarely influential pieces of economic data highlighted weakness in the US labor market ahead of broad data for February to be released Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普称将推迟墨西哥对 USMCA 下的商品征收关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，他将豁免墨西哥对北美贸易协定（USMCA）范围内的任何商品和服务征收 25% 的新关税，这为美国的一个主要贸易伙伴提供了一个缓刑期。【原文：President Donald Trump said he will exempt Mexico from his new 25% tariffs on any goods and services that fall under the North American trade agreement known as USMCA, offering a reprieve for a major US trading partner.】

item.title: 微软计划在南非进行 2.97 亿美元的人工智能投资
item.description: 到 2027 年底，微软公司将在南非追加投资 54 亿兰特（约合 2.97 亿美元），以扩大其在南非的云计算和人工智能能力。【原文：Microsoft Corp. will invest an additional 5.4 billion rand ($297 million) in South Africa by the end of 2027 to expand its cloud and artificial intelligence capacity in the country.】

item.title: 美联储哈克警告通胀压力上升威胁进展
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行行长帕特里克-哈克（Patrick Harker）表示，随着企业和消费者变得更加谨慎，通胀压力增大，经济面临的风险正在上升。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Patrick Harker said risks to the economy are rising as businesses and consumers become more cautious and inflationary pressures build.】

item.title: 2026 年油价暴跌为陷入困境的多头带来希望
item.description: 明年的石油价格随着附近期货市场的下跌而下跌，此举有可能威胁到供应增长。【原文：Oil prices for next year have fallen alongside nearby futures markets, a move that runs the risk of menacing supply growth.】

item.title: 拉加德称协助欧盟防务支点不是欧洲央行的职责所在
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲中央银行在帮助各国政府为更多国防开支提供资金方面并没有发挥作用，它将坚持其稳定物价的使命。【原文：The European Central Bank doesn’t have a role in helping governments finance more defense spending and will stick to its mission of price stability, President Christine Lagarde said.】

item.title: 美国制裁的油轮从俄罗斯向叙利亚运送柴油
item.description: 一艘油轮在俄罗斯的一个大型港口装载柴油，驶向叙利亚，这表明莫斯科有能力在这个地中海国家保持影响力。【原文：A tanker loaded diesel at a large Russian port and sailed to Syria, a sign of Moscow’s ability to maintain influence in the Mediterranean country.】

item.title: 特朗普关税贸易影响下美国黄金库存创历史新高
item.description: 数百亿美元的金条在关税推动下疯狂流入美国，目前美国交易所仓库中的黄金数量创下了历史新高。【原文：A record amount of gold is now sitting in US exchange warehouses, after tens of billions of dollars of bullion flowed into the country in a tariff-driven frenzy.】

item.title: 土耳其股市第三次降息后将进入牛市
item.description: 土耳其股市将进入牛市，在周四降息后，今年进一步降息的预期推动土耳其股市延续涨势。【原文：Turkish stocks were set to enter a bull market, extending gains driven by expectations for further interest-rate cuts this year after Thursday’s reduction.】

item.title: 据说孤星银行旗下的新银行将在里斯本首次公开募股中增加更多银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，葡萄牙新银行（Novo Banco SA）已经增加了更多的银行，参与计划中的首次公开募股。【原文：Portuguese lender Novo Banco SA has added more banks to work on a planned initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.description:
别管法学硕士了。硅谷投资者有了人工智能新宠。【原文：

Forget LLMs. Silicon Valley investors have a new favorite AI play.

item.title: 随着 DOGE 的余波扩散，50 万个美国工作岗位岌岌可危
item.description: 特朗普政府迅速大幅缩减联邦政府的规模，这让经济学家们重新考虑了关于 2025 年劳动力市场将再次稳健扩张的预测。【原文：The Trump administration’s rapid efforts to dramatically shrink the size of federal government have economists rethinking forecasts for another solid year of labor market expansion in 2025.】

item.title: 特朗普政策深入人心，美国高管变得更加悲观
item.description: 一项调查显示，自唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）1月份重返白宫以来，关税和通胀的不确定性损害了美国企业的乐观情绪，这与他赢得总统大选后企业高管们的乐观情绪截然相反。【原文：Uncertainty around tariffs and inflation has hurt US business optimism since Donald Trump’s return to the White House in January, marking a sharp reversal from the buoyant mood among executives after his win in the presidential election, a survey shows.】

item.title: 雷-达里奥的 "全天候 "战略在动荡中进入 ETF 领域
item.description: 布里奇沃特联合公司（Bridgewater Associates）创始人雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）著名的 "全天候"（All Weather）策略已经登陆交易所交易基金市场，正值该策略试图防范的宏观动荡席卷全球资产之际。【原文：Bridgewater Associates founder Ray Dalio’s famous “All Weather” strategy has arrived in the exchange-traded fund market, just as the kind of macro-driven turmoil it seeks to guard against sweeps global assets.】
